TopicTitle: Steam / offgassing of rockets sitting on pad

Articles.Content:
Wouldn't it be cool to see your masterpiece heavy lifter crouched on the pad, white steam and gases boiling off through the bleed off valves while the timer counts to zero?

Well, wouldn't it?
I second this, and it would also compliment the alternative fuels mod very well, since the hydrogen in that bleeds off over time.
